name: Phys Man (Universal)
description:
Phys Man is a human body simulator based on physics.
You can do some actions to the Phys Men.

[Features]
- Realistic motion of the Phys Men.
- Gyro or Compass and Accelerometer provide 6-axis motion sensing.
- Retina display is supported.
- Realistic shadow by OpenGL ES 2.0.

[Compatibility]
- iPhone / iPod touch and iPad are compatible.
- OpenGL ES 2.0 is not required.
- Gyro and Compass and Accelerometer are not required.

[Actions to the Phys Men]
- Spawn the Phys Men
- Catch and Drop and Throw the Phys Men
- Shoot the balls to the Phys Men

[Option settings]
- Renderer (OpenGL ES 1.1 / OpenGL ES 2.0)
- Retina Display (On / Off)
- Shadow (On / Off)
- Motion sensing (Gyro / Compass / Accelerometer / None)
- Maximum number of Phys Men (1 - 8)
- Time scale (0% - 100%)

[Motion sensing modes]
- Gyro + Accelerometer
- Compass + Accelerometer
- Accelerometer
- None
